## Checklist
- [ ] Commit messages follow `type(scope): subject` (`feat|fix|chore|docs|refactor|test|build|ci`)
- [ ] No generated Unreal files committed (`Binaries/`, `Intermediate/`, `Saved/`, `DerivedDataCache/`)
- [ ] C++ files are formatted (`.clang-format`)
- [ ] README / docs updated when behavior changed
- [ ] Local test performed (at least one: Unreal playtest or legacy `cmake --build build`)
